name: A Million Zombies
description:
ZOMBIES!!!

HUNDREDS...

THOUSANDS...

A MILLION ZOMBIES!! 

A horrible virus has turned many of the worlds citizens into mindless zombies, hungry for brains!

It’s up to YOU to deliver the cure!

Inspired by classic games such as Contra, Metal Slug and Streets of Rage, A Million Zombies is fast, frantic arcade fun for everyone!

The finished version of the game will feature:

  • Survival Mode and Story Mode
  • Power Ups and additional play mechanics
  • Player Select
  • Additional levels
  • Additional Enemy types
  • And lots more!
